mapper.sql: id, dprtcode, shlx, shdh, shbmid, shrid, shrq, jddxid, jdfzr, zt, zdrid, zdsj, bz, xgdjid, fhdw

B1.ID, B1.DPRTCODE, B1.SHLX, B1.SHDH, B1.SHBMID, B1.SHRID, B1.SHRQ, B1.JDDXID, B1.JDFZR, B1.ZT, B1.ZDRID, B1.ZDSJ, B1.BZ, B1.XGDJID, B1.FHDW, CASE WHEN B1.SHLX = 1 OR B1.SHLX = 2 THEN B2.HTLSH WHEN B1.SHLX = 3 THEN B3.SQDH ELSE '' END XGDJBH, U1.USERNAME AS SHRUSERNAME, U1.REALNAME AS SHRREALNAME, U2.USERNAME AS ZDRUSERNAME, U2.REALNAME AS ZDRREALNAME

, B5.ID AS DETAILID, B5.BJID, B5.XGDJID AS DXGDJID, B5.SN, B5.PCH, B5.KWID, B5.SL, B5.THSL, B5.IS_ZJ, B5.KCLLID, B5.YJID, D1.ID AS HCMAINDATAID,D1.BJH, D1.ZWMS, D1.YWMS, D1.GLJB, D3.ID AS YJMAINDATAID,D3.BJH AS YJBJH, D3.ZWMS AS YJZWMS, D3.YWMS AS YJYWMS, D3.GLJB AS YJGLJB, D2.MAINID AS CKID,B6.ID AS SECONDMENTID,B6.JDDXBH ,B6.JDDXLX ,B6.JDDXMS

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.keyword != null and paramsMap.keyword != ''

mapper.insert: insert into b_h_020 (id, dprtcode, shlx, shdh, shbmid, shrid, shrq, jddxid, jdfzr, zt, zdrid, zdsj, bz, xgdjid) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jddxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgdjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into b_h_020
id,
dprtcode,
shlx,
shdh,
shbmid,
shrid,
shrq,
jddxid,
jdfzr,
zt,
zdrid,
zdsj,
bz,
xgdjid,
fhdw,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{shdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{jddxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jdfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xgdjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fhdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update b_h_020
shlx = #{shlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shdh = #{shdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shbmid = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shrid = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shrq = #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jddxid = #{jddxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jdfzr = #{jdfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zt = #{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zdrid = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zdsj = sysdate,
bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xgdjid = #{xgdjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fhdw = #{fhdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update b_h_020 set shlx = #{shlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shdh = #{shdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shbmid = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shrid = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shrq = #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jddxid = #{jddxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdfzr = #{jdfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zt = #{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zdrid = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zdsj = #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xgdjid = #{xgdjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM B_H_020 B1 LEFT JOIN B_H_004 B2 ON B1.XGDJID = B2.ID LEFT JOIN B_H_018 B3 ON B1.XGDJID = B3.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U1 ON B1.SHRID = U1.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U2 ON B1.ZDRID = U2.ID
AND B1.ZT IN (1,2)
ORDER BY B1.SHDH DESC
ORDER BY B1.${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select B.ID AS "ID", B.MAINID AS "MAINID", B.DHSL AS "DHSL" , B.RKSL AS "RKSL" , B.BJID AS "BJID", B.BJH AS "BJH", B.ZWMS AS "ZWMS", B.YWMS AS "YWMS", B.HCLX AS "HCLX", B.GLJB AS "GLJB", B.JLDW AS "JLDW", b.zdsl as "ZDSL" FROM (SELECT t.*, CASE
when t.bjid = #{item.bjid} then t.zdsltemp - #{item.sl}
when 1 = 1 then t.zdsltemp
else t.zdsltemp end zdsl from (select bh00401.id, bh00401.mainid, bh00401.dhsl, bh00401.rksl, bh00401.ht_sl - bh00401.dhsl as ZDSLTEMP, d008.id as bjid, d008.bjh, d008.zwms, d008.ywms, d008.hclx, d008.gljb, d008.jldw from b_h_00401 bh00401 left join b_h_00201 bh00201 on bh00401.tddhcid = bh00201.id left join d_008 d008 on bh00201.bjid = d008.id where bh00401.ht_sl > bh00401.dhsl and bh00401.zt = 1 and bh00401.mainid = #{paramsMap.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T) B where b.zdsl > 0

select b.id as "ID", b.mainid as "MAINID", b.dhsl as "DHSL", b.rksl as "RKSL" , b.bjid as "BJID", b.bjh as "BJH", b.zwms as "ZWMS", b.ywms as "YWMS", b.hclx as "HCLX", b.gljb as "GLJB", b.jldw as "JLDW", b.zdsl as "ZDSL", b.sn as "SN" from (SELECT t.*, CASE
when t.bjid = #{item.bjid} then t.zdsltemp - #{item.sl}
when 1 = 1 then t.zdsltemp
else t.zdsltemp end ZDSL from (select bh00401.id, bh00401.mainid, bh00401.dhsl, bh00401.rksl, bh00401.ht_sl - bh00401.dhsl as ZDSLTEMP, d008.id as BJID, d008.bjh, d008.zwms, d008.ywms, d008.hclx, d008.gljb, d008.jldw, bh017.sn from b_h_00401 bh00401 left join b_h_00203 bh00203 on bh00401.tddhcid = bh00203.id left join b_h_017 bh017 on bh00203.kcllid = bh017.id left join d_008 d008 on bh017.bjid = d008.id where bh00401.ht_sl > bh00401.dhsl and bh00401.zt = 1 and bh00401.mainid = #{paramsMap.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T) B where b.zdsl > 0

select b.id as "ID", b.mainid as "MAINID", b.jlsl as "JLSL", b.bjid as "BJID", b.bjh as "BJH", b.zwms as "ZWMS", b.ywms as "YWMS", b.hclx as "HCLX", b.gljb as "GLJB", b.jldw as "JLDW", b.zdsl as "ZDSL" from (SELECT t.*, CASE
when t.bjid = #{item.bjid} then t.zdsltemp - #{item.sl}
when 1 = 1 then t.zdsltemp
else t.zdsltemp end ZDSL from (SELECT bh01801.ID, bh01801.mainid, bh01801.sl AS JLSL, bh01801.shsl - bh01801.sl as zdsltemp, d008.ID AS BJID, d008.bjh, d008.zwms, d008.ywms, d008.hclx, d008.gljb, d008.jldw FROM b_h_01801 bh01801 LEFT JOIN d_008 d008 ON bh01801.bjid = d008.ID where bh01801.shsl > bh01801.sl and bh01801.zt = 1 and bh01801.mainid = #{paramsMap.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T) B where b.zdsl > 0

SELECT
FROM B_H_020 B1 LEFT JOIN B_H_004 B2 ON B1.XGDJID = B2.ID LEFT JOIN B_H_018 B3 ON B1.XGDJID = B3.ID LEFT JOIN B_H_006_NEW B4 ON B1.ID = B4.SHDID AND B4.ZT IN (2, 10) LEFT JOIN B_H_02001 B5 ON B1.ID = B5.MAINID LEFT JOIN B_H_014 B6 ON B1.JDDXID = B6.ID LEFT JOIN D_008 D1 ON B5.BJID = D1.ID LEFT JOIN D_00901 D2 ON B5.KWID = D2.ID LEFT JOIN D_008 D3 ON B5.YJID = D3.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U1 ON B1.SHRID = U1.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U2 ON B1.ZDRID = U2.ID where b1.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE B_H_004 SET DHZT = (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM B_H_00401 T1 WHERE T1.MAINID = #{htid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.ZT=1 AND T1.DHSL>0) = 0 THEN 1 WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM B_H_00401 T1 WHERE T1.MAINID = #{htid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.ZT=1 AND T1.HT_SL>T1.DHSL) = 0 THEN 3 ELSE 2 END), ZT = (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM B_H_00401 T1 WHERE T1.MAINID = #{htid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.ZT=1 AND T1.HT_SL>T1.DHSL) = 0 THEN 10 ELSE 2 END) WHERE ID = #{htid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, DPRTCODE, JDLX, WPDXID, BJID, BJH, PCH, SN, KCSL, GHSL, WPSJ, ZT, BZ, SXQX, SPQX FROM B_H_012 WHERE DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND JDLX = #{jdlx, jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND BJID = #{bjid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SN = #{sn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND KCSL > GHSL AND ZT = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM B_H_00401 BH00401 INNER JOIN B_H_004 BH004 ON BH00401.MAINID = BH004.ID WHERE BH00401.ID = #{xgdjid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND WPDXID = BH004.GYSID )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_H_01201 (ID, MAINID, SJLX, GLDJLX, DJID, KCLLID, DPRTCODE) VALUES (#{wpqdxxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gldjlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{djid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kcllid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO B_H_012 (ID, DPRTCODE, JDLX, WPDXID, BJID, BJH, PCH, SN, KCSL, GHSL, WPSJ, ZT) VALUES (#{wpqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jddxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kcsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ghsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wpsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM B_H_012 WHERE ID = #{wpqdid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
DELETE FROM B_H_01201 WHERE ID = #{wpqdxxid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM B_H_02001 B1 LEFT JOIN B_H_017 B2 ON B1.KCLLID = B2.ID LEFT JOIN B_H_001 B3 ON B2.KCID = B3.ID WHERE B1.MAINID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (CASE WHEN B1.SL IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B1.SL END)!= (CASE WHEN B3.KCSL IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B3.KCSL END)

SELECT B2.ID, B2.DPRTCODE, B2.HTLX, B2.HTLSH, B2.HTH, B2.JJCD, B2.GYSID, B2.GYSBM, B2.GYSMC, B2.HTQDRQ, B2.BZ, B2.ZT, B2.DHZT, B2.ZDBMID, B2.ZDRID, B2.ZDSJ, B2.ZDJSRID, B2.ZDJSRQ, B2.ZDJSYY, B2.FJFY FROM B_H_00401 B1 LEFT JOIN B_H_004 B2 ON B1.MAINID = B2.ID WHERE B1.ID = #{xgdjid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B1.DHSL > B1.HT_SL

SELECT B2.ID, B2.DPRTCODE, B2.SQDH, B2.FJZCH, B2.JDDXID, B2.BZ, B2.ZT, B2.SQDWID, B2.SQRID, B2.SQSJ FROM B_H_01801 B1 LEFT JOIN B_H_018 B2 ON B1.MAINID = B2.ID WHERE B1.ID = #{xgdjid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B1.SL > B1.SHSL
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM B_H_008_NEW B1 INNER JOIN B_H_020 B2 ON B1.SHDID = B2.ID WHERE B2.ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B1.ZT IN (2, 10)

SELECT ID, DPRTCODE, JDLX, WPDXID, BJID, BJH, PCH, SN, KCSL - GHSL AS KCSL, GHSL, WPSJ, ZT, BZ, SXQX, SPQX FROM B_H_012 WHERE DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND JDLX = #{jdlx, jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND BJID = #{bjid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND KCSL > GHSL AND WPDXID = #{jddxid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ZT = 1 ORDER BY WPSJ DESC
SELECT B1.ID, B1.MAINID, B1.SJLX, B1.GLDJLX, B1.DJID, B1.KCLLID, B1.DPRTCODE, B1.CXSL FROM B_H_01201 B1 INNER JOIN B_H_02001 B2 ON B1.DJID = B2.ID WHERE B2.ID = #{djid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
